content:
I noticed you have a nice bot that auto-merges adaption PRs now, but it seems it's commits don’t get run by CI:
foo.png
(Likely because you are using the default auth token of github actions, which annoyingly means that it won’t trigger more actions.)
This could be solved by integrating the action with the one bumping the toolchain in the first place, which would avoid pushing known-broken intermediate states
But still push as separate commits? It’s actually quite useful to see what’s happend, and that branch is anyways broken half the time… ;-)

Joachim Breitner said:

But still push as separate commits

Sure, just at once
